Coherent Mobile Solution for Real Estate Industry

Getting a trusted property is now no longer a heavy burden to carry. The real estate mobility solution and web portals have changed the scenario of dealing with properties nowadays. Choose the filters according to your needs and your property is just a click away.

The real estate development company has diverted its interest in mobile as well as website development solutions. This has increased the user interaction to the real estate agencies. From a small enterprise to MNCs, every real estate industry has accepted the need for app and website to enhance their business.

By keeping the note of users and property dealers, Ninehertz packs the real estate web development and application creation, which is simple to use and creates a worth remembering user experience. We are a real estate app development company which provides an easy to use interface, 24X7 services, and maintenance. The mobile app development for real estate by our coders is compatible on various platforms. Also, our real estate web developers create various clones such as Zillow clone script, Redfin clone script, Trulia clone script, Magicbricks clone script and 99acres clone script.

Real Estate CRM Software with AR & VR

In the world of 3D, 4D and 7D, the dimension is increasing and getting better in visual experience. VR is computer-generated stimulation that makes you see the reality of how it will look like after completion.

When digital information is overlayered on the actual physical world. it is termed as Augmented Reality. The camera targets the pictures and sensors make you view the real-type picture.

The action of AR and VR is covering every sector of the industry and real estate doesn’t seem to be untouched by it. Augmented reality and real estate are walking hand-in-hand to lead a drastic revolution in the industry. The use of AR AND VR technology has made the real estate industry a luxurious business. Tour the property without seeing them in a person.

Being an agent is a tough task to make the clients tour several properties in a day. Virtual reality in real estate industry helps to witness your property.

Also one can view the plan of the property before it is built. This technology helps you to see the property from any part of the world. It has widened the scope of choices for the buyers while lessening up the tour headache of the agents.The augmented reality use in real estate has given a new perspective to the users and made the interaction between the parties an easy job to deal with.

Wish to enhance your profit for real estate business? Add glitters of AR and VR technology to it. Let’s connect to discuss further.

Contact us

Real Estate Management Software Features

Mobile Search & Real Estate Feed Integration

Get the updated news about the real estate industry and make a better decision for your future capital planning.

Integrated with Google Analytics & In-App Analytics

Analysis helps you to understand the better market rate and other important factors before buying/selling any property.

Property Listing Syndication with Video/Images

View the videos and images in high pixel quality to address the type of property you are looking for. Now sit and visit the various property in a minute.

Upload Bulk Property Listings Through In-built CSV Feature

Uploading property info one-by-one is time taking. So get an easy solution to upload multiple property info at a time. Save your time and energy for other tasks.

Currency Converter and Interest Rate Calculators

No matter which country you are planning to buy a property in. We have the solution for global properties with the currency converter. This will help you to buy/sell your property in the various country currencies.

Location-Based Search Option

Need any specific location? Use the location-based feature to deal with the desired location. Select the region and get the list of properties within a fraction of seconds.

Realtors Appointment

Book an appointment with your dealers. It saves your time and drops the unnecessary visit of sites. Reserve your time for a meeting with your respective property owner/ dealer.

Push Notifications to Promote Offers & Events

Don’t miss any update from the real estates. Get the notification on phone or via mail. Also, notify with the upcoming offers and great deals for the users.

GPS Integration to Show Turn by Turn Directions

Finding a hassle to reach your site? Take the GPS to reach your property quickly and grab the best option for your estate.
